text: The 1985–86 Western Kentucky Hilltoppers men's basketball team represented Western Kentucky University during the 1985–86 NCAA Division I men's basketball season. The Hilltoppers were led by Sun Belt Conference Coach of the Year Clem Haskins, in his final year at the helm.1985-86 Sun Belt Conference Season Summary, Sports Reference, retrieved 2 May 2020 WKU finished second in the conference and received a bid to the 1986 NCAA Division I Men's Basketball Tournament.2019-2020 WKU Basketball Media Guide retrieved 21 April 2020 This team's roster featured three future NBA players Tellis Frank, Kannard Johnson, and Clarence Martin.1987 NBA Draft, Basketball Reference, retrieved 2 May 2020 Billy Gordon, Johnson, and Martin were selected to the All-Conference Team, while Ray Swogger made the SBC All-Tournament Team.2016-17 SBC Basketball Media Guide, retrieved 28 April 2020 ==Schedule== 1985-86 Western Kentucky Hilltoppers Schedule and Results, Sports Reference, retrieved 4 May 2020 |- !colspan=6| Regular Season |- |- !colspan=6| 1986 Sun Belt Conference Men's Basketball Tournament |- !colspan=6| 1986 NCAA Division I Men's Basketball Tournament ==References== Western Kentucky Category:Western Kentucky Hilltoppers basketball seasons Western Kentucky Western Kentucky Basketball, Men's Western Kentucky Basketball, Men's
title: 1985–86 Western Kentucky Hilltoppers basketball team
